title: Modern Main Method
instructions: Rewrite the Greeter program using Java 25 compact source file syntax. Use void main() and IO.println() instead of the traditional boilerplate.

hints.text: Start with 'void main()' - no public, no static, no class wrapper needed.

commonMistakes.consequence: Implicit main methods don't need static
commonMistakes.correction: Just use 'void main()' - static is implied

commonMistakes.consequence: Defeats the purpose of implicit classes
commonMistakes.correction: Write the main method directly, no class needed

commonMistakes.consequence: Works but misses the modern shorthand
commonMistakes.correction: Use IO.println() - the IO class is in java.lang and auto-imported
